string-array.name: news_details
string-array.item: WFG National Title Insurance Co. added Robert Horvat to serve as senior vice president of Northwest operations and divisional counsel. He will primarily support WFG National Title’s Oregon and Washington title operations. In his role, he will offer underwriting, claims and general legal counsel; provide internal and outside training and support all aspects of daily operations.

Title365 Co., a provider of title insurance and escrow services, promoted Clay White to chief compliance officer from director of compliance and implementations. In his new role, he will be responsible for regulatory compliance, audits and procedural standards along with assessment of potential risks and opportunities for industry innovation of benefit to Title365 clients.

WFG National Title Insurance Co. added Robert Horvat to serve as senior vice president of Northwest operations and divisional counsel. He will primarily support WFG National Title’s Oregon and Washington title operations. In his role, he will offer underwriting, claims and general legal counsel; provide internal and outside training and support all aspects of daily operations.

In his role, he will offer underwriting, claims and general legal counsel; provide internal and outside training and support all aspects of daily operations.

In his new role, he will be responsible for regulatory compliance, audits and procedural standards along with assessment of potential risks and opportunities for industry innovation of benefit to Title365 clients.

WFG National Title Insurance Co. added Robert Horvat to serve as senior vice president of Northwest operations and divisional counsel. He will primarily support WFG National Title’s Oregon and Washington title operations. In his role, he will offer underwriting, claims and general legal counsel; provide internal and outside training and support all aspects of daily operations.

Title365 Co., a provider of title insurance and escrow services, promoted Clay White to chief compliance officer from director of compliance and implementations. In his new role, he will be responsible for regulatory compliance, audits and procedural standards along with assessment of potential risks and opportunities for industry innovation of benefit to Title365 clients.

WFG National Title Insurance Co. added Robert Horvat to serve as senior vice president of Northwest operations and divisional counsel. He will primarily support WFG National Title’s Oregon and Washington title operations. In his role, he will offer underwriting, claims and general legal counsel; provide internal and outside training and support all aspects of daily operations.

Title Resource Group expanded its Sunbelt Title operations into Brevard County, Fla., through the acquisition of Security First Title & Escrow. The newly acquired company’s three offices are in Melbourne, Merritt Island and Orlando. It will now operate as Sunbelt Title Agency, which is owned and operated by TRG.

Title365 Co., a provider of title insurance and escrow services, promoted Clay White to chief compliance officer from director of compliance and implementations. In his new role, he will be responsible for regulatory compliance, audits and procedural standards along with assessment of potential risks and opportunities for industry innovation of benefit to Title365 clients.
